extensionDescription.message: Password generator - allows use the same password for every domain but generated password will be for every domain unique and different.

popup_description_C_1.message: The generator will generate password for the

popup_description_1_1.message: domain according to the stored rule.

popup_description_2_1.message: domain with same rules as are used for all

popup_description_3_1.message: domain according to the current generator preferences.

popup_alert_rule_not_found.message: The password can't be generated - the rule for this domain isn't stored yet

options_lbl_use_stored.message: Use stored generator rules for password generating

options_confirm_del_all_rules.message: All stored rules will be deleted

options_alert_invalid_json.message: Selected JSON file has an invalid format

options_alert_invalid_preference_name.message: Selected JSON file contains invalid preference name

options_alert_invalid_preference_type.message: Selected JSON file contains invalid preference type

options_alert_invalid_pwd_len.message: Selected JSON file contains invalid password length value:

options_alert_invalid_time.message: Selected JSON file contains invalid time to show password value:

options_alert_invalid_const_len.message: Selected JSON file contains invalid constant length

options_alert_invalid_base64_enc.message: Selected JSON file contains invalid Base-64 encoding value

options_alert_invalid_hex_enc.message: Selected JSON file contains invalid HEX encoding value
